score: 1 out of 2 people found the following review useful
review: Patch Adams is a great movie.  Robin Williams gives a great performance, (which he should've received an Oscar for), and the rest of the cast is fantastic.  When you're feeling discouraged and need inspiration, Patch Adams will inspire you.  If you haven't seen this movie, I strongly suggest you watch it.
